title: Yahoo chief Mayer says she's pregnant with twins
text: Yahoo chief Mayer says she's pregnant with twins Tuesday, 1 September 2015 (6 minutes ago) SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer says she's pregnant with identical twins. Mayer says on a posting on her blog that she and her husband are expecting the twin girls in December. Mayer said Monday that her twins were due in December and that she planned to work throughout her pregnancy. NYTimes.com 2 hours ago - Front Page Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer announced on Tuesday that she is expecting twin girls at the end of the year. Mayer received intense scrutiny during her first... Huffington Post 3 hours ago - Business Marissa Mayer, the 40-year-old chief executive of Yahoo, has revealed that she is expecting identical twin girls in December. Independent 3 hours ago - Business Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer announced Monday she’s pregnant with twin daughters. The news comes as Mayer still has a lot to prove to analysts and investors, who... SeattlePI.com 4 hours ago - Technology Marissa Mayer, chief executive officer of Yahoo!, says she is pregnant with identical twin girls that are due in December. Brisbane Times 4 hours ago - Front Page Yahoo president and chief executive Marissa Mayer has revealed she is pregnant with twins, but said she plans to take “limited time away”and will be... City A.M. 4 hours ago - Business Marissa Mayer, chief executive officer of Yahoo!, says she is pregnant with identical twin girls that are due in December. The Age 5 hours ago - Front Page (Reuters) - Yahoo Chief Executive Marissa Mayer is pregnant with identical twin girls, likely due in December, she said in a blog post.
